sensormodule.name: Sensormodule
sensormodule.description: Research Sensormodules which can be used to equip on spaceships or survey craft

landingmodule.name: Landing module
landingmodule.description: Research landing modules to be able to land equipment, people and machinery on the surface of planets.

habitat.name: Habitat
habitat.description: Research habitat modules to be able to colonize on otherwise unhabitable objects

displacement.name: Displacement basic research
displacement.description: Research displacement technology which might yield various applications if researched more thoroughly.

displacement2.name: Displacement of non liquids
displacement2.description: Research displacement technology allowing displacement of non liquid objects of the same type

displacement3.name: Displacement of liquids
displacement3.description: Research displacement technology allowing displacement of liquids of the same type

displacement4.name: Displacement of combined materials
displacement4.description: Research displacement technology allowing displacement of constructions and machinery

displacement_accuracy.name: Displacement accuracy enhancement
displacement_accuracy.description: Research the accuracy of displacement technology to increase success rate and accuracy of displacements

displacement_preperation_time.name: Displacement preparation enhancement
displacement_preperation_time.description: Research displacement even more to be able to displace objects faster than before.

displacement_distance.name: Displacement distance enhancement
displacement_distance.description: Research displacement even more to be able to displace objects further distances.
